attributes.action: Send national aid to Yemen due to the humanitarian crisis
attributes.additional_details: A child dies every 10 minutes in Yemen & 24 million people are affected by famine. If 24 million people were affected by famine in the UK, we would expect international aid, so why are we not giving to a country in severe need of it? Do their lives not matter as much as people living in more developed countries? I want the government to intervene or even help in any way possible as CHILDREN are dying at a unreasonable rate. Covid-19 will wipe this country off the map unless we do something now.
attributes.background: Send food/water/medical supplies etc. that will aid Yemen, a country in Famine which is also suffering from effects of Cholera AND Covid-19.
